work.summary: Positioned with the Software Engineering Team but in collaboration with other teams as necessary.
highlights: Current project (Signaling Team): creating an input system (frontend, Python) for commissioning engineers who are involved in calculating equipment measurements (inclinometer offsets, battery voltage, etc.) at level crossings.
Committee oversight: member onboarding, volunteer staffing, league compliance, and corrective action.
Managing internal operational standards and organizational goals with regards to new and existing members.
Streamlining processes for 160% faster turnaround and improved clarity.

work.summary: K-12; specialization in Special Education and Behaviour Disorder classrooms; preference for disadvantaged schools.
highlights: Cultivated connections and strong student rapport to foster classroom engagement.
Redirected students using Positive Behaviour Support.

work.summary: Contract positionâ€” Religious Studies 210: Paths of World Religions.
highlights: Facilitated discussions and encouraged independent thought by posing open-ended questions.
Provided advice and guidance to students needing morale-boosting and academic advising.

work.summary: Student mentor for elementary math programme, developed by Reasoning Mind and used nationwide (USA).
highlights: Offered stability and positive reinforcement to inspire student engagement with the materials.
Counselled students individually to help promote personal and educational motivation.

work.summary: Popular Teaching Assistant, with assignments in various modules. Invited Guest Lecturer in Religious Studies and Philosophy.
highlights: Offered complete instructional support for students unable to attend regular classes and delivered personalised educational and emotional support to individual students to establish a positive learning environment.
Independently led recitation sections (RS 2100) and review sessions to increase student interest and understanding.
Tutored struggling students individually and in small groups to reinforce learning outcomes.
